title: EvidenceVariableRoleSubtype Value Set
description: This value set is a temporary workspace while drafting the Evidence Based Medicine Implementation Guide. It may not be stable and may not be persistent.

relatedArtifact.citation: EvidenceVariableRoleSubtype Value Set [ValueSet]. Contributors: Brian S. Alper [Authors/Creators]. In: Fast Evidence Interoperability Resources (FEvIR) Platform, FOI 179424. Revised 2023-11-21. Available at: https://fevir.net/resources/ValueSet/179424. Computable resource at: https://fevir.net/resources/ValueSet/179424.

designation.value: Variable represents a first of two measured variables to be used in a measured variable that is a mathematical operation of two measured variables.
Variable represents a second of two measured variables to be used in a measured variable that is a mathematical operation of two measured variables.
Variable represents a result of a mathematical operation of two measured variables.

name: evidence-variable-role-subtype
